overview: Life under lockdown: Sara works from home, helping people distressed by COVID-19. Her husband Kais needs constant antipsychotic medication but has run out of his supply. Outside, the city is like a ghost town. How will they survive this confinement without sinking into depression? Can their marriage ever return to normal? Director Nejib Belkadhi also plays Kais, giving a raw, complex and emotionally charged performance in a situation we can all recognise.
title: Communion
